text: Michel Crauste (July 6, 1934 - May 2, 2019) was a French international rugby union player. He played as a flanker and Number 8 for Racing Club de France and FC Lourdes. He was born in Saint-Laurent-de-Gosse, France. Crauste died on May 2, 2019 at the age of 84.Michel Crauste, dit «Le Mongol», est mort ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2019 deaths Category:French rugby union players Category:People from Landes Category:Sportspeople from Nouvelle- Aquitaine
title: Michel Crauste
